name: split-spaced-strings
description: Toggle single-line to multi-line string formats

splitSpacedStrings.autoCollapseOnSave.description: Automatically collapse split strings back to single line when saving the file

splitSpacedStrings.highlightBackgroundCo.description: Background color for highlighted split strings (CSS color format)

splitSpacedStrings.highlightBorderColor.description: Border color for highlighted split strings (CSS color format)

splitSpacedStrings.highlightBorderWidth.description: Border width for highlighted split strings

splitSpacedStrings.highlightBorderStyle.description: Border style for highlighted split strings

splitSpacedStrings.overviewRulerColor.description: Color for the overview ruler markers (CSS color format)

splitSpacedStrings.overviewRulerLane.description: Position of the overview ruler markers

splitSpacedStrings.highlightWholeLine.description: Highlight the whole line or just the text range

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
